title: 820-3115 distorted graphics
message: No liquid damage board looks good. Just arrived like this. Does this look like a PCH or CPU issue?

title: 820-3115 distorted graphics
message:
If still the same on external monitor, then change the RAM.
Test one module at a time, on each slot.

title: 820-3115 distorted graphics
message: Check Screen connector in the board, any corrosion? Check RAMs and try with a different screen.
